TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RadioButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase

summary.span: 当与其他 控件成对出现时，使用户能够从一组选项中选择一个选项。

span.span: Enables the user to select a single option from a group of choices when paired with other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以显示文本， ，和/或文件名。The control can display text, an , or both. 当用户选择一个选项按钮 （也称为单选按钮），组中的时，其他将自动清除。When the user selects one option button (also known as a radio button) within a group, the others clear automatically. 所有控件在给定容器中，如，构成一个组。All controls in a given container, such as a , constitute a group. 若要在一个窗体上创建多个组，将每个组置于其自己的容器，如或控件。To create multiple groups on one form, place each group in its own container, such as a or control. 和控件具有类似的函数： 它们提供用户可以选择或清除的选择。 and controls have a similar function: they offer choices a user can select or clear. 区别是，多个控件可以选择在同一时间，但是互相排斥的选项按钮。The difference is that multiple controls can be selected at the same time, but option buttons are mutually exclusive. 使用属性来获取或设置的状态的。Use the property to get or set the state of a . 可以更改选项按钮的外观以作为切换式按钮或标准的选项按钮出现通过设置属性。The option button's appearance can be altered to appear as a toggle-style button or as a standard option button by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化两个中控制。The following code example creates and initializes two controls in a . 该示例使用事件来跟踪其然后报告的所选的文本所选当用户单击。The example uses the event to track which is selected and reports the text of the selected when the user clicks a . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form. 调用`InitializeRadioButtons`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。Call `InitializeRadioButtons` from the form's constructor or the event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认视图具有右侧的按钮对齐其文本和属性设置为`true`。The default view of the has its text aligned to the right of the button and the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化、 为它赋予一个切换按钮的外观，设置其属性`false`，并将其添加到。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle button, sets its property to `false`, and adds it to a . summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于确定 的外观。

span.span: Gets or sets a value determining the appearance of the .
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值设置为，则循环的复选框以绘制控件。If the value is set to , then the control is drawn with a circular check box. 如果值设置为，则为向上或向下状态绘制为可切换的控件。If the value is set to , then the is drawn as a control that can be toggled to an up or down state. 任一类型可以显示文本、 图像，或两者。Either type can display text, an image, or both. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化、 为它赋予切换控件的外观，设置其属性`false`，并将其添加到。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle control, sets its property to `false`, and adds it to a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`RadioButton1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RadioButton1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#535](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#535)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#535](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#535)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它指示：在单击控件时， 值和控件的外观是否自动更改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value and the appearance of the control automatically change when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在发生 事件时自动更改 值和控件的外观，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value and the appearance of the control automatically change on the event; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值设置为`false`、的控件部分，必须签入中的代码事件处理程序。If the value is set to `false`, the portion of the control must be checked in code in the event handler. 此外，如果属于控件组，此属性可确保在给定时间只能有一个控件被检查。In addition, if the is part of a control group, this property ensures that only one of the controls is checked at a given time. 如果属性设置为`false`、 组控件将不能充当互相排斥的组和属性必须在代码中更新。If the property is set to `false`, a group of controls will not act as a mutually exclusive group and the property must be updated in code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化、 为它赋予切换控件的外观，设置其属性`false`，并将其添加到。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle control, sets its property to `false`, and adds it to a . summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何属性可以在运行时更改。The following code example demonstrates how the property can be changed at run time. 复选框部分到左的文本或向右移动时值更改。The check box portion of a is moved to the right or left of the text when the value changes. 此示例需要窗体和上实例化控件的引用已包含命名空间。This example requires that a control has been instantiated on a form and that a reference to the namespace has been included. [!code-cpp[Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
